column4: I have downloaded the alternate CD, but can't find the OEM option!
its on one of the f-key options.  Either F4 or F6
Not on the main menu anymore, since the menu was gettign too big.
is not on the F.. keys.
maybe they moved it to the desktop disk?
This is hardy?
yep
no, its not on the desktop disk.  Or at least, if it was, it would still be on the Alternate
on gutsy it was on the alternate cd
I have it here in front of me, on avirtual machine, and... no OEM or similar
What are the menu entries for f4 and f6?
F$ is "Mode", and the only option is Normal
F4
F6 is Option
and they are expert mode, acpi, etc
What are all the options?  One of those is OEM
no, wait, I list them
expert mode, acpi=off, noapic, nolapic, edd=on, Free Software only. That's it
Maybe its some other menu. It is on the alternate CD though.  I ... just haven't installed in forever.
on gutsy it was on F4 but now there is only one choice: Normal
